app_descript:
LUDEX Sports Card Scanner +TCG

Easily identify, track, value, and sell your sports and trading card collection with Ludex. This innovative app empowers card collectors by providing instant insights into card values and market trends, streamlining the process of buying and selling across diverse sports categories including Baseball, Basketball, Football, Soccer, Hockey, MMA, Racing, as well as popular trading card games like Pok√©mon and Magic: The Gathering.

üìå Core Features

  • Instant Card Identification: Use patent-pending AI technology to scan and identify any card in seconds, regardless of era. üïë
  • Real-Time Value Assessment: Leverage proprietary algorithms that gather sales data from major marketplaces for accurate price updates. üìà
  • Seamless Marketplace Integration: Effortlessly buy and sell cards with the built-in ‚ÄúList-It‚Äù tool that allows you to quickly make cash sales. üí∏
  • Organized Collection Management: Ditch spreadsheets and documents with customized filters and binders for efficient collection management. üìö
  • Deck Building for TCGs: Easily build and manage TCG decks, assisting strategists for upcoming competitions. üéÆ

üëç Pros

  • User-Friendly Interface: Designed for simplicity, making it easy for users of all levels to navigate. üëå
  • Wide Range of Card Categories: Supports various sports and trading card formats, appealing to all collectors. ‚öΩÔ∏è
  • Flexible Membership Plans: Offers a free plan with essential features and affordable premium options for advanced collectors. üí∞
  • Real-Time Tracking: Keeps collectors updated with pricing shifts, ensuring informed buying and selling decisions. ‚è±Ô∏è
  • Comprehensive Selling Tools: Direct listing on eBay enhances convenience in cashing out collections. üõí

üëé Cons

  • Limited Free Features: The free plan restricts certain functionalities, like the number of eBay listings. üö´
  • Subscription Costs for Full Access: Premium features can add up, potentially deterring casual users. üí≥
  • Data Accuracy Dependent on Market Activity: Price valuations may fluctuate widely based on market trends, creating potential inconsistencies. üîÑ
  • Learning Curve for New Users: Some functionalities may require time to master for novice card collectors. üéì

üíµ Price

  • Free Plan: Unlimited scans; 60 added cards in portfolio; 5 eBay listings/month.
  • Lite Plan: $4.99/month or $49.99/year; includes unlimited scans and 50 eBay listings/month.
  • Standard Plan: $9.99/month or $89.99/year; all categories with unlimited scans; 50 eBay listings/month.
  • Pro Membership: $24.99/month or $239.99/year; unlimited scans and 250 eBay listings/month.
